name: Super Maid Brigade
description:
GATHER YOUR SKIRTS AND GUNS!

Super Maid Brigade is a 4 Player CO-OP 2D top down shooter with an elite fighting force known as the Maid Brigade. Their mission: cleaning up the universe of evil with modern military gadgets and tools. 

Features
  • Local Couch CO-OP allows for up to four players
  • Four different worlds to fight in; forest, desert, artic, and urban environments
  • Five unique characters with their own abilities and weapons
  • An extra survival mode where players must work together as long as possible fighting off swarm of enemies
Scheduled for 2019

Game is expected to be released in 2019. Our prototype is in the works until May, we're aiming for online multiplayer but that is super tentative. An alpha release is in the works and we'll have a working game by April.

Join our Discord and discuss things with us live! Discord Channel
